sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calcutaleAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() // it is a static data after some time we will use api and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) //destructure properties from tour object const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calcutaleAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calcutaleAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not Rated" ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} {city} {city}
) } export default TourDetails
